title: Jeskyně v bažinách
content:
Ve hře Zaklínač, jeskyně v bažinách is one of several caves. It is located in the southern part of the bažiny just off the road through the forest. The entrance is guarded by echinopsae. The corpse outside is not a great omen. There is a ohniště, so it's not all bad, but be sure to clear out the utopenci and topivec before trying to meditate there. V Akt II, vlci are found there. V Akt III, there are kuroliškové and much more.

There is also what appears to be a burial chamber with a vran's sarcophogus surrounded by large obelisky that flank a path leading down to the Kruh visících kamenů, Kruh živlů for the sign Quen. The sarcophagus contains one of the sephirah as well as a nice sekera.

Obsah
1	Úkoly
2	Rostliny
3	Nestvůry
4	Mapy
